amendment.description: To allocate amounts for telehealth for veterans.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3409 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3409 proposed by Senator Collins for Senator Hirono to Amendment SA 3411. To allocate amounts for telehealth for veterans.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3409 proposed by Senator Collins for Senator Hirono to Amendment SA 3411.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3409 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
